entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 16 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 16 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness then periods of light snow beginning near midnight and ending before morning. Clearing before morning. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Saturday 07 January 2023
